name: Flip of Light
description:
Precision platforming with a unique twist: instantly flip from ceiling to floor, whether on ground or in air. Chain your double jump with this signature move to overcome 180+ hand crafted levels in many vibrant stages!



- Tons of unique level mechanics, all designed around your signature move!
- Tight, responsive, fair, fast-paced gameplay!



Explore for optional collectables and take on special stages, designed to challenge even the most hardcore platforming experts!
